name: Lucky Island
description:
《Lucky Island》 is a light Rogue deck-building game that combines island construction and management with slot machine. It features a charming pixel art style that creates a relaxing and refreshing environment for players to create their own unique islands.


Game Features:
    Slot machine mode island management
    Rich selection of slot machine decks
    Free island design
    Variable skills with different effects
    Rogue style trigger events

Game Introduction:
In 《Lucky Island》 players take on the role of an island owner and engage in island construction and management. During the day, players command islanders to work and complete various tasks, while the night is dedicated to planning the island.


Players have the freedom to build their islands according to their preferences and ideas, creating unique landscapes. The game introduces the concept of slot machines, allowing players to manage their islands through slot machine gameplay. By designing the slot machine and utilizing skills at the right time, players can provide better living conditions for the islanders and improve work efficiency.


In 《Lucky Island》 players can continually build island and engage in more activities and developments. While luck plays a role in the game, players can achieve their dream islands and ensure the happiness of their islanders through their efforts, wisdom, resource planning, and skill utilization.


Additionally, the game offers various unique skills that bring different effects and benefits to the island. Furthermore, Rogue-style triggered events exist in the game, which can have positive or negative impacts on the island. Players need to adeptly respond to and handle these events.


Combining elements of island construction, slot machine management, and strategic planning, 《Lucky Island》 offers players a diverse and engaging gaming experience. It allows you to unleash your creativity, while challenging your management and strategic skills. Embark on your 《Lucky Island》 adventure now and build your prosperous and thriving island!
